name: ext_R4_CoverageEligibilityRequest_supportingInfo
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.CoverageEligibilityRequest.supportingInfo for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents CoverageEligibilityRequest.supportingInfo from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CoverageEligibilityRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R3.
